location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Francis Warden, Chief Secretary to the Government at Bombay, to William Bruce, Resident at Bushire

mods.abstract: Letter acknowledging letters dated 5 April 1816 and confirming he will notify the Board of Directors that the debt relating to the ship Hectorfrom 1802-1803 will be written off. The letter also requests that Bruce enquire about an unaccounted credit to the Bussora [Basra] Residency in 1804.The letter also includes 'Statement of Old Balances Outstanding on the Books of the Bushire Residency with the Explanations of the late and present Resident thereon and the Remarks of the Accountant General Submitted by the Order of Government'.
